common_2040_top_02:
Now, tell me... What do you think of our entrance
hall? Do you enjoy being surrounded by books?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2040_top_03a:
That’s good to hear. It was renovated a few
years ago, and I was the one who came up with\r
the new design![VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2040_top_03b:
Oh, I’m sorry to hear that... I was in charge of
creating this new design when we renovated it\r
a few years ago...[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2040_top_04:
But more importantly, I would very much like to
hear your report on the Gym Leaders![VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2040_top_05:
Ah, now that I think about it, this location is
perhaps a little too...public.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2040_top_06:
Do you know of anywhere quiet where we might
be able to discuss things a bit more discreetly?[VAR 0114(0011)]
